SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class RMIServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.RMIServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, Remote
public class RMIServer extends Object implements VirtualServer
This class is the RMI server that handles the connection between the server and the client.

      public void handleAction(int actionToPerform, Integer id, String username, List<Integer> startingGamesId, List<Integer> gamesWhitDisconnectionsId) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:
      handleAction in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:

      id - is the id of the connection.
      username - is the username of the connection.
      startingGamesId - is the list of the id of the games that are starting.
      gamesWhitDisconnectionsId - is the list of the id of the games that have disconnections.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a connection error.
